title: LibGuides: COVID-19 Resources for Patients and Families: French (Français) - new resources
author: Vesna Silobad
description: LibGuides: COVID-19 Resources for Patients and Families: French (Français) - new resources
cleaned_text: While vaccination is not mandatory, everyone is strongly encouraged to get vaccinated. Join your family and friends and plan to get vaccinated once vaccines become available to you. Vaccine Information for Patients & Families - Centre for Addiction and Mental Health (CAMH) Know the facts about the COVID-19 vaccines; get answers to some of the most common questions about the vaccines; know what to expect when getting the vaccine; and have informed conversation with family member about whether or not they should get the vaccine.
